description: This file defines the SearchViewModel class and associated data structures for handling search queries and updating UI state in a Kotlin-based Android app. It manages search input, debouncing, calls to a weather data repository, and state updates for UI components.

classes.name: SearchState
classes.description: Data class representing the current state of the search UI, including query text, status message, and results summary.

classes.name: SearchViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel class managing the search logic, including query updates, debounce handling, and state emission for UI updates.

methods.name: updateQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query, performs debounce, triggers the search in the repository, and updates the state based on search results.
